Buying Guide

Retinol (vitamin A) is the most clinically proven anti-aging ingredient available without a prescription. It accelerates cell turnover, boosts collagen, and fades dark spots ‚Äî but requires patience and proper use.

Quick Tips

  • üí° Start with 0.025-0.05% retinol and work up ‚Äî jumping to high concentrations causes irritation
  • üí° Always pair retinol with sunscreen ‚Äî it makes skin more sun-sensitive
  • üí° Use retinol at night only ‚Äî UV light degrades its effectiveness
  • üí° The 'retinol purge' (initial breakout) typically lasts 2-6 weeks ‚Äî push through it
